official-title.#text:
To direct the Secretary of Commerce, acting through the Administrator of the National Oceanic and
			 Atmospheric Administration, to conduct coastal community vulnerability
			 assessments related to ocean acidification, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was referred to the

committee-name.#text: Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act of 2014
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act of 2014

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 12406 of the Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406
Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:a
Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:a/p:2

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , by striking the period at the end and inserting
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:a/p:3

text.#text: by adding at the end the following:

includes an ongoing mechanism that allows affected industry members, coastal stakeholders,
			 non-federal resource managers, and outside scientific experts to provide
			 input on research, data, and monitoring needs that are necessary to
			 support on-the-ground management, decisionmaking, and adaptation related
			 to ocean acidification and its impacts.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:b
Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:c
Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall conduct an ocean
			 acidification coastal community vulnerability assessment, and issue a
			 corresponding public report, that shall be updated at least once every 5
			 years.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:a
Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:b/p:1

text.#text: assess the nature of those communities’ social and economic vulnerabilities;

identify key knowledge gaps where research could be devoted to better understand the possible
			 impacts of ocean acidification on these vulnerable communities, the risks
			 and threats facing these communities, and possible adaptation strategies
			 for these communities; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text:
National Oceanic and
			 Atmospheric Administration’s National Marine Fisheries Service

text.#text:
be conducted in collaboration with experts who are familiar with the unique economic, social,
			 ecological, geographic, and resource concerns of the Nation’s coastal
			 communities, including representatives from the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Section 12405(b) of the Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12405/ss:b
Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12405/ss:b/p:8

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , by striking the period at the end and inserting
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12405/ss:b/p:9

text.#text: by adding at the end the following:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Federal Ocean Acidification Research And Monitoring Act of 2009/s:12406/ss:b

text.#text:
make recommendations for research that should be conducted, including in the social sciences and
			 economics, to address the key knowledge gaps identified in the community
			 vulnerability assessment report conducted under

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 4692 IH: Coastal Communities Ocean Acidification Act of 2014
